Student.title: Student
Student.description: Represents a student in the talent bank platform.

id.description: Unique identifier for the Student entity.

firstName.description: The first name of the student.

lastName.description: The last name of the student.

email.description: The email address of the student.

faculty.description: The faculty the student belongs to.

courseYear.description: The year of study the student is in (1-6).

profilePictureUrl.description: URL of the student's profile picture.

talentScore.description: The overall talent score of the student.

category.description: The student's primary talent category (STEM, Humanities, Arts, etc.).

successStory.description: A short story or testimonial about the student's success.

skillIds.description: References to Skills. (Relationship: Student N:N Skill)

Skill.title: Skill
Skill.description: Represents a skill or ability a student possesses.

id.description: Unique identifier for the Skill entity.

name.description: The name of the skill (e.g., 'Python', 'Graphic Design').

Project.title: Project
Project.description: Represents a project a student has worked on.

id.description: Unique identifier for the Project entity.

description.description: A brief description of the project.

role.description: The student's role in the project.

link.description: A link to the project (e.g., GitHub repository, live demo).

mediaUrl.description: URL to an image or video showcasing the project.

Achievement.title: Achievement
Achievement.description: Represents an achievement or award a student has received.

id.description: Unique identifier for the Achievement entity.

name.description: The name of the competition or award.

position.description: The student's position or rank in the competition (e.g., '1st place', 'Finalist').

date.description: The date the achievement was earned.

level.description: The level of the competition (International, National, Regional, University).

certificateUrl.description: URL to a certificate or proof of the achievement.

SocialLink.title: SocialLink
SocialLink.description: Represents a social media or portfolio link for a student.

id.description: Unique identifier for the SocialLink entity.

platform.description: The name of the social media platform (e.g., 'LinkedIn', 'GitHub').

url.description: The URL to the student's profile on the platform.

Category.title: Category
Category.description: Represents a category of talent (e.g., STEM, Humanities, Arts).

id.description: Unique identifier for the Category entity.

Faculty.title: Faculty
Faculty.description: Represents a faculty within the university.

id.description: Unique identifier for the Faculty entity.

StudentOrganization.title: StudentOrganization
StudentOrganization.description: Represents a student-led organization within the university, which can also act as a user.

id.description: Unique identifier for the Student Organization entity.

email.description: The email address used for logging into the platform.

name.description: The name of the student organization.

description.description: A brief description of the student organization's mission and activities.

memberIds.description: An array of student IDs who are members of the organization.

status.description: The status of the student organization (approved, pending, archived).

News.title: News
News.description: Represents a news article or blog post for the platform.

id.description: Unique identifier for the news post.

slug.description: URL-friendly slug for the news post.

title.description: The title of the news post.

content.description: The main content of the news post, can contain HTML.

coverImageUrl.description: URL for the cover image of the post.

authorId.description: The ID of the admin user who created the post.

authorName.description: The name of the admin user who created the post.

createdAt.description: The timestamp when the post was created.

updatedAt.description: The timestamp when the post was last updated.

StudentOrgUpdate.title: StudentOrgUpdate
StudentOrgUpdate.description: Represents an update or news post from a student organization.

organizationId.description: The ID of the student organization posting the update.

content.description: The content of the update, can contain HTML.

createdAt.description: The timestamp when the update was created.
